import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Image, Card, Button, } from 'react-bootstrap' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/paymentStep' import ErrorMessageBox from '../components/ErrorMessagebox' // import { createOrder } from '../actions/orderActions' export default function PaymentScreen(props) { const payment = useSelector((state) => state.payment) payment.itemsPrice = payment.cartItems.reduce( (a, c) => a + c.price * c.qty, 0 ) payment.shippingPrice = payment.itemsPrice > 100 ? 0 : 10 payment.taxPrice = Number((0.15 * payment.itemsPrice).toFixed(2)) console.log(payment.taxPrice) payment.totalPrice = payment.itemsPrice + payment.shippingPrice + payment.taxPrice const dispatch = useDispatch() const placeOrderHandler = () => { // dispatch( // createOrder({ // orderItems: payment.cartItems, // shippingAddress: payment.shippingAddress, // paymentMethod: payment.paymentMethod, // itemsPrice: payment.itemsPrice, // shippingPrice: payment.shippingPrice, // taxPrice: payment.taxPrice, // totalPrice: payment.totalPrice, // }) // ) } const orderCreate = useSelector((state) => state.orderCreate) const { success, order, error } = orderCreate useEffect(() => { if (success) { props.history.push(`/order/${order._id}`) } }, [success]) return ( <>

Detail

{payment.savePaymentInformation.name}, {payment.savePaymentInformation.email}, {payment.savePaymentInformation.description}, {payment.savePaymentInformation.donation},

Payment

Method: {payment.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{payment.cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Cart is empty ) : ( {payment.cartItems.map((item) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ${payment.itemsPrice} Shipping ${payment.shippingPrice} Tax ${payment.taxPrice} Total ${payment.totalPrice} {error && ( {error} )} ) }
